paragraph.heading: 2Compiling

list.item: Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Clicking open loads the selected project
Choose the location where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the configuration file.

paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see text output showing the size and amount of free space available on each of your local drives.
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: DISCSPACE_DEMO contains a once feature, diskspace which returns an instance of ../../reference/wel_disk_space_chart.xmlWEL_DISK_SPACE, used to query the local drives.

This sample contains only one class:
DISKSPACE_DEMO
